title: Machi Gurumi no Wana: Hakudaku ni Mamireta Shitai
synopsis: Lewd eyes from all directions... Atsuko has just moved to a town to work as a teacher. She looks forward to her new life there, but what awaits her is... Yes, she gradually gets involved in a storm of sexual assaults planned by the everyone in town... (Source: ErogeShop)
